tool_description: IDfy’s ICMA Verification API enables you to verify if a user is actually a member of ICMA. The verification API is real-time and non-intrusive in nature.
title: ICMAI Verification

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: ICMAI Verification
api_list.description:
The Institute of Cost and Management Accountants of India (ICMAI) is a premier statutory professional accountancy body in India under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Corporate Affairs, Government of India with the objects of promoting, regulating and developing the profession of Cost & Management Accountancy.

 

IDfy’s ICMA Verification API enables you to verify if a user is actually a member of ICMA. The verification API is real-time and non-intrusive in nature.

Use GET Call API to fetch results, using the request_id obtained in the response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://icmai-verification.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/ind_icmai"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "icmai-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
